assumptions: Key financial data such as cash on hand, monthly revenue, and monthly expenses are not provided in the text.
Without financial data, net burn, runway, and CAC payback cannot be calculated.
flags: Complete absence of financial metrics (cash, revenue, expenses) prevents any financial analysis.
Traction metrics like users and customers are provided, but not monetized figures like MRR or ARR.
CAC and Gross Margin data are missing, making payback period calculation impossible.
Some information is future-dated (e.g., 'Metaverse Startup of the year 2025', 'Â© 2025 Ctruh').
